TEXT.TITLE: HIGHLAND SUPERSTORES <HIGH> MARCH SALES GAIN
TEXT.BODY: Highland Superstores Inc said its March sales rose to 50.6 mln dlrs from 47.4 mln dlrs a year ago. On a comparable store basis, it said the sales decreased nine pct. Reuter
